name: Teldroid
description: Telegram Userbot, Written in Python Using Telethon.

API_ID.description: You api id, from my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRoBot.

API_HASH.description: You api hash, from my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRoBot.

SESSION_STRING.description: Your session string, Generate with @SessionStringBot or session_gen.py

REDIS_URL.description: Redis database endpoint url, get from redislabs.com

REDIS_PASSWORD.description: Redis database password, get from redislabs.com
